âœ… Correct: A. Statements (1) and (2) are false (statement (3) is true).
Why the false statements are false:
- (1) A registration statement (e.g., S-1) is filed before the offering; it is required for registered public offerings.
- (2) The final prospectus includes the final offer terms (including the offer price) and is finalized after pricing.
